mapper.insert: insert into free_board (free_board_num, board_code, subject, content, nickname,insert_date) values ( #{free_board_num},'r', #{subject}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{insert_date} )
insert into notice (notice_num, board_code, subject, content,insert_date) values ( #{notice_num},'n', #{subject}, #{content}, #{insert_date} )
insert into tip_board (tip_board_num, board_code, subject, content, nickname,insert_date) values ( #{tip_board_num},'v', #{subject}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{insert_date} )
mapper.select: select * from free_board order by free_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from notice order by notice_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from tip_board order by tip_board_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update free_board set readcount=readcount+1 where free_board_num=#{free_board_num}
update notice set readcount=readcount+1 where notice_num=#{notice_num}
update tip_board set readcount=readcount+1 where tip_board_num=#{tip_board_num}
update free_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where free_board_num=#{free_board_num}
update notice set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where notice_num=#{notice_num}
update tip_board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where tip_board_num=#{tip_board_num}
mapper.select: select content from free_board where content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
